alert.note: Alert for Bedford; Cannon; Coffee; Grundy; Marshall; Rutherford; Warren (Tennessee) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued August 12 at 12:29PM CDT until August 12 at 1:15PM CDT by NWS Nashville
info.description: The National Weather Service in Nashville has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southern Marshall County in Middle Tennessee... Southeastern Rutherford County in Middle Tennessee... Southwestern Warren County in Middle Tennessee... Coffee County in Middle Tennessee... Bedford County in Middle Tennessee... Western Grundy County in Middle Tennessee... Southwestern Cannon County in Middle Tennessee... * Until 115 PM CDT. * At 1228 PM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from Murfreesboro to near Lewisburg, moving east at 50 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Shelbyville, McMinnville, Lewisburg, Manchester, Tullahoma, Monteagle, Cornersville, Altamont, Morrison, Wartrace, Bell Buckle, Normandy, Viola, Beechgrove, Raus, Fosterville, Belfast, Unionville, Christiana and Summitville. This includes the following highways... Interstate 65 between mile markers 26 and 30. Interstate 24 between mile markers 90 and 131. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.

area.areaDesc: Bedford; Cannon; Coffee; Grundy; Marshall; Rutherford; Warren
